settings.interval: Minutes interval to add points to online users when stream online
settings.offlineInterval: Minutes interval to add points to online users when stream offline
settings.messageInterval: How many messages to add points
settings.messageOfflineInterval: How many messages to add points when stream offline
settings.perInterval: How many points to add per online interval
settings.perOfflineInterval: How many points to add per offline interval
settings.perMessageInterval: How many points to add per message interval
settings.perMessageOfflineInterval: How many points to add per message offline interval
